title: Dedicated About Sangharsh Classes page with SEO and static export separation

requirements.summary: Add a dedicated /about page and remove About content/section from the homepage to avoid duplication.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting / (homepage) does not render the About content/section.
The About content is not duplicated across multiple routes/pages.

file_operations.description: Remove the About section/component from the homepage composition so About content is not rendered on /.
Create the dedicated About page for the /about route using existing site layout components (e.g., Header/Footer) for consistency.
Wire SPA routing to render HomePage at / and AboutPage at /about (simple pathname-based routing or existing routing approach), ensuring /about is navigable and not shown on /.

Add navigation access to /about (and ensure existing section-scroll behavior remains for homepage sections). Use existing Header styles/components (shadcn-ui Button/Sheet already in use). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure the About page renders an H1 heading exactly "About Sangharsh Classes" and does not alter the homepage H1.
acceptanceCriteria: /about contains exactly one primary H1 that reads "About Sangharsh Classes".
The homepage H1 remains the homepage hero H1 and is not changed as part of this requirement.

file_operations.description: Render a single primary H1 with the exact text "About Sangharsh Classes" on the /about page, ensuring no additional H1s are introduced.

requirements.summary: Set /about SEO metadata (document title and meta description) exactly as specified without changing homepage SEO.
acceptanceCriteria: When /about is loaded, the browser tab title is exactly "About Sangharsh Classes | SSC, Railway & Banking Coaching in Muzaffarpur".

When /about is loaded, the page has a meta description tag whose content matches exactly: "Learn about Sangharsh Classes, a trusted SSC, Railway and Banking coaching institute in Muzaffarpur with experienced faculty and proven results."
Homepage SEO title/meta description remain unchanged from their currently specified homepage values.

file_operations.description: On AboutPage mount, set document.title exactly as specified and ensure a meta[name="description"] tag exists with the exact specified content; on unmount/navigation away, restore prior title/description so the homepage values remain unchanged.

requirements.summary: Place the user-provided About page body content on /about verbatim and only on /about.
acceptanceCriteria: The About page body text matches the user-provided About content verbatim (character-for-character), including punctuation and line breaks as provided.
No portion of the user-provided About content appears on the homepage (/).

file_operations.description: Add a single exported multiline string constant containing the user-provided About page body content verbatim (character-for-character, including line breaks) from the BuildRequest source message; do not reuse this content anywhere else.

Render the About body content from frontend/src/content/aboutPageContent.ts without rewriting or reformatting; preserve line breaks in rendering (e.g., via appropriate HTML structure) while keeping styling consistent.
Confirm the homepage no longer imports/renders any About content so none of the verbatim About page body text can appear on /.

requirements.summary: Keep the existing design system intact; reuse existing components/styles and avoid global styling changes.
acceptanceCriteria: No visual styling changes occur to existing shared components (Header, Hero, Faculty, Courses, Contact, Footer) outside what is necessary to support navigation to /about and removing About from the homepage.
Tailwind classes/theme variables remain consistent with the existing site styling.

file_operations.description: Implement AboutPage using the same layout patterns (container, spacing, typography classes) and shared components already used on the site; avoid adding or changing global styles.

Keep existing Header styling and behavior; only introduce the minimal navigation change needed to access /about while preserving current look and feel. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure /about contains no system/debug text or AI/platform branding in UI and in static export outputs.
acceptanceCriteria: No system/debug/AI/platform branding strings are visible anywhere on /about in the live UI.
The static export (generated HTML/ZIP, if produced by the build) does not contain any system/debug/AI/platform branding strings for the About page content.

file_operations.description: Ensure AboutPage UI renders only the required heading and the verbatim provided content (plus existing site chrome like Header/Footer) with no debug/system/branding strings.
Ensure the generated static About HTML contains only the required title/meta/H1/body content (and necessary site markup) and does not inject system/debug/AI/platform branding strings.

requirements.summary: Add /about to the sitemap without changing the existing homepage sitemap entry.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/sitemap.xml includes an additional <url> entry for https://sangharshclasses.in/about (or equivalent canonical About URL used by the app).
The existing homepage <url> entry remains present and unchanged.

file_operations.description: Add a new <url> entry for https://sangharshclasses.in/about with appropriate <lastmod>, <changefreq>, and <priority>, keeping the existing homepage <url> entry unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update static export generation so homepage export excludes About-only content and a dedicated About HTML export is produced with correct H1/SEO/content.
acceptanceCriteria: Static export homepage HTML does not include the About page-only content.
Static export includes an About page HTML artifact that contains the required H1, title tag, meta description, and verbatim body content.

file_operations.description: Refactor static export generation to (a) generate homepage HTML without embedding the About section/body content, and (b) generate a dedicated About page HTML that includes the required title tag, meta description, a single H1 "About Sangharsh Classes", and the verbatim About body content.

Update the static export plugin to write a dedicated About HTML artifact (e.g., static-export/about/index.html) alongside the homepage export, ensuring the homepage export remains free of About-only content and the About artifact includes the required SEO/H1/body content.
